Detailed Description

The FastMath class provides a number of trigonometrical operations with reduced accuracy and greater speed than the math.h implementation.

It should be used when speed is important and accuracy can afford a reduction. The class is a Singleton, and uses sin and cos tables built a single time, at initial construction.

Author:
Ben Constable, original Java code by Oli Winks
Version:
1.0
